articles.author: Matthew Burgess, Divya Patil
articles.title: Stock Market Today: Dow, S&P Live Updates for March 18 - Bloomberg
articles.description: Asian stocks climbed, led by Japanese shares, as investors awaited policy decisions from Japan and the US this week for near-term trading cues.
articles.content:
Asian stocks climbed, led by Japanese shares, as investors awaited policy decisions from Japan and the US this week for near-term trading cues.
